title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 24 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 24 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Why, seeing times are not hidden from the Almighty, do they that know him not see his days?
lineList.cn: 全能者既定期罚恶，为何不使认识他的人看见那日子呢。

lineList.en: Some remove the landmarks; they violently take away flocks, and feed thereof.
lineList.cn: 有人挪移地界，抢夺群畜而牧养。

lineList.en: They drive away the ass of the fatherless, they take the widow's ox for a pledge.
lineList.cn: 他们拉去孤儿的驴，强取寡妇的牛为当头。

lineList.en: They turn the needy out of the way: the poor of the earth hide themselves together.
lineList.cn: 他们使穷人离开正道，世上的贫民尽都隐藏。

lineList.en: Behold, as wild asses in the desert, go they forth to their work; rising betimes for a prey: the wilderness yieldeth food for them and for their children.
lineList.cn: 这些贫穷人，如同野驴出到旷野，殷勤寻梢食物。他们靠着野地给儿女糊口，

lineList.en: They reap every one his corn in the field: and they gather the vintage of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 收割别人田间的禾稼，摘取恶人馀剩的葡萄。

lineList.en: They cause the naked to lodge without clothing, that they have no covering in the cold.
lineList.cn: 终夜赤身无衣，天气寒冷毫无遮盖，

lineList.en: They are wet with the showers of the mountains, and embrace the rock for want of a shelter.
lineList.cn: 在山上被大雨淋湿，因没有避身之处就挨近磐石。

lineList.en: They pluck the fatherless from the breast, and take a pledge of the poor.
lineList.cn: 又有人从母怀中抢夺孤儿，强取穷人的衣服为当头。

lineList.en: They cause him to go naked without clothing, and they take away the sheaf from the hungry;
lineList.cn: 使人赤身无衣，到处流行，且因饥饿扛抬禾捆，

lineList.en: Which make oil within their walls, and tread their winepresses, and suffer thirst.
lineList.cn: 在那些人的围墙内造油，榨酒，自己还口渴。

lineList.en: Men groan from out of the city, and the soul of the wounded crieth out: yet God layeth not folly to them.
lineList.cn: 在多民的城内有人唉哼，受伤的人哀号。神却不理会（那恶人的愚妄。

lineList.en: They are of those that rebel against the light; they know not the ways thereof, nor abide in the paths thereof.
lineList.cn: 又有人背弃光明，不认识光明的道，不住在光明的路上。

lineList.en: The murderer rising with the light killeth the poor and needy, and in the night is as a thief.
lineList.cn: 杀人的黎明起来，杀害困苦穷乏人，夜间又作盗贼。

lineList.en: The eye also of the adulterer waiteth for the twilight, saying, No eye shall see me: and disguiseth his face.
lineList.cn: 奸夫等候黄昏，说，必无眼能见我，就把脸蒙蔽。

lineList.en: In the dark they dig through houses, which they had marked for themselves in the daytime: they know not the light.
lineList.cn: 盗贼黑夜挖窟窿，白日躲藏，并不认识光明。

lineList.en: For the morning is to them even as the shadow of death: if one know them, they are in the terrors of the shadow of death.
lineList.cn: 他们看早晨如幽暗，因为他们晓得幽暗的惊骇。

lineList.en: He is swift as the waters; their portion is cursed in the earth: he beholdeth not the way of the vineyards.
lineList.cn: 这些恶人犹如浮萍快快飘去。他们所得的分在世上被咒诅。他们不得再走葡萄园的路。

lineList.en: Drought and heat consume the snow waters: so doth the grave those which have sinned.
lineList.cn: 乾旱炎热消没雪水，阴间也如此消没犯罪之辈。

lineList.en: The womb shall forget him; the worm shall feed sweetly on him; he shall be no more remembered; and wickedness shall be broken as a tree.
lineList.cn: 怀他的母（原文是胎）要忘记他。虫子要吃他，觉得甘甜。他不再被人记念。不义的人必如树折断。

lineList.en: He evil entreateth the barren that beareth not: and doeth not good to the widow.
lineList.cn: 他恶待（或作他吞灭）不怀孕不生养的妇人，不善待寡妇。

lineList.en: He draweth also the mighty with his power: he riseth up, and no man is sure of life.
lineList.cn: 然而神用能力保全有势力的人，那性命难保的人仍然兴起。

lineList.en: Though it be given him to be in safety, whereon he resteth; yet his eyes are upon their ways.
lineList.cn: 神使他们安稳，他们就有所倚靠。神的眼目也看顾他们的道路。

lineList.en: They are exalted for a little while, but are gone and brought low; they are taken out of the way as all other, and cut off as the tops of the ears of corn.
lineList.cn: 他们被高举，不过片时就没有了。他们降为卑，被除灭，与众人一样，又如谷穗被割。

lineList.en: And if it be not so now, who will make me a liar, and make my speech nothing worth?
lineList.cn: 若不是这样，谁能证实我是说谎的，将我的言语驳为虚空呢。
